name: The Carradine Family Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: I am the father of David, Keith, and Robert Carradine. I am the grandfather of Martha Plimpton.
I appeared in this movie with Burt Reynolds in 1999. The movie is 'The Hunter's Moon': who am I?
Just call me Lewis Skolnick, I am a Tri-Lam.
questions.explanation:
Robert Carradine & Robert.

	'Revenge of The Nerds': Anthony Edwards (Dr. Mark Greene from 'ER') was Lewis' roommate.

questions.text: I am the son of Mr. Carradine, but his sons are only my half-brothers. I may only be a half-sibling, but I know my KUNG-FU.
My birth name is Richmond Reed Carradine. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
John Carradine.

	John was also billed as: John Peter Richmond and Peter Richmond.
